Name: Pizza Heart Bar

Name: Pizza Heart Bar
Review Text: Nice Italian pizzeria. We kind of had contact with all the waiters and waitresses that were there and all of them made it feel like family. Very cozy. The food is great and they have some nice vegan options for Pizza and Dessert (try the vegan Tiramisu!)

Name: Pizza Heart Bar
Review Text: Simply the best pizza in southeast. Cozy place with lots of space that never feels crowded. Very friendly and relaxed staff. Gotta try the buratta and the diavola. Plus, the only real marinara I ve tried in the whole Amsterdam.

Name: Pizza Heart Bar

Review Text:

Name: Pizza Heart Bar
Review Text: Happy, friendly and hard working staff that love doing their job. Shout out to the (vegan) lady who served us, what a sweet heart. Pizza‚Äôs are also great, a lot of vegan options, the vegan mozzarella is to die for!

Name: Pizza Heart Bar
Review Text: Perhaps the best pizza in town. Excellent service, nice and quiet location, great wine selection. Seems the people running it are from Puglia which means tasty dishes are served, with southern Italian flair.

Review Text: pizza is like everywhere else, staff is not so friendly, bit arrogant and not very helpful

Name: Pizza Heart Bar
Review Text: Very bad service. They changed our big group reservation from the terrace to inside without asking, because they wanted to keep the terrace free for others, so we didn't have the nice outside evening we were promised to get. The owners were not very friendly. Not recommended.

Name: Pizza Heart Bar
Review Text: Our orders were done very fast, friendly service. But the heart in the pizza was missing in our eyes, the dough was crispy but didn‚Äôt taste much. The cheese was stringy but had little flavor. The price didn‚Äôt match the size. We wouldn‚Äôt bother with a review if the bar hadn‚Äôt declared its love for pizza. We didn‚Äôt love it.

Name: Pizza Heart Bar
Review Text: Great food and service, fair prices. Overall an excellent experience!

Name: Pizza Heart Bar
Review Text: Authentic Italian, delicious pizzas and friendly people, also beautiful inside. Can call before going to order a pick up pizza.

Name: Pizza Heart Bar

Review Text: We came for pizza and cocktails before a show at AFAS Live, and the staff was awesome, the food came fast, and the pizza was yummmmmy. They have lots of good veggie options! They forgot our salad and charged us for it, but we should have checked on that before paying, so it's actually our fault. Great place!

Name: Pizza Heart Bar
Review Text: One of best pizzas I ever had üòç Perfect dough!

Review Text: Love the pizzas in this place and the atmosphere. Name: Pizza Heart Bar

Name: Pizza Heart Bar

Name: Pizza Heart Bar
Review Text: I waited two hours for my pizza and they gave me the wrong one. Extremely unfriendly manager aswell. Do not go eat here!
